metadata.publisher: Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL), SUB Göttingen

metadata.source: included as Appendix I in: Prabhas Chandra Sen: Mahasthan and Its Environs, Rajshahi, Bengal : Varendra Research Society 1929 (Varendra Research Society's Monographs, 2)

body.text: COMM.: e. atraiva: corr., atrava ed. Cf. vs. 46.
COMM.: b. saṃpūrṇa-: corr., samparṇa- ed.

children.text: paśor jñānaṃ kathayati guhas tadgṛhe tāmracūḍo
kheṣu chhattraṃ na phaṇati phaṇī dvisvaro jīvalokaḥ
proccā bhūmir bhavati taruṇaḥ snānataḥ kāmyakuṇḍe
bhogo yajño bhramaṇanaṭanaṃ tatra vākyaṃ hi vedaḥ
snānād yatra nihanti pāpanicayaṃ śrīpāṇitoyā nadī
devas tārakamārako 'pi nitarāṃ jñānaṃ dadāty adbhutaṃ
kaupaṃ yat paya eva tailavipulaṃ pauṇḍraṃ puraḥ pātu vaḥ

body.text: COMM.: c. adbhutaṃ: corr., adbhūtaṃ ed.
COMM.: a. taddhāre: is this the intended reading? Or taddhari? The printing is unclear.
COMM.: In this GRETIL version verse 85 had to be divided for technical reasons; it should be read as one verse.
ity uttarapauṇḍrakhaṇḍe sūtaśaunakasaṃvāde paraśurāmaviracitaṃ karatoyāmāhātmyaṃ samāptam |
